text: Forrest M. Bird (June 9, 1921 - August 2, 2015) is an American aviator, inventor and biomedical engineer. He was best known for having created some of the first reliable mass-produced mechanical ventilators for acute and chronic heart and lung care. ==References== ==Other websites== * MIT Inventor of the Week: Forrest Bird * American Respiratory Care Foundation: Forrest M.
